summary.introduction: Highly skilled software engineer specializing in backend development with Django, Flask, REST APIs, and DevOps. Proven expertise in designing scalable systems and developing full-stack applications with React, Docker, Kafka, and AWS.
body: Experienced in developing RESTful APIs and microservices using Django and Flask frameworks.
Proficient in containerization with Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
Skilled in using message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka) and caching systems (Redis).
Solid understanding of frontend technologies, including React and modern JavaScript.
Strong problem-solving skills, with a passion for system design, optimization, and team collaboration.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer (Backend)
description: Designed and implemented REST APIs using Python, Flask, and MySQL, successfully deploying to production.
Refactored and optimized existing services, improving response time by 80% and reducing latency by 90%.
Implemented unit, integration, and performance tests to enhance overall system reliability.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained a payment gateway using Django Rest Framework, Docker, and PostgreSQL.
Integrated APIs with multiple payment providers and financial institutions, ensuring system reliability and security.
Collaborated closely with frontend teams to ensure a smooth, scalable user experience.

experience.title: Python Backend Developer
description: Developed a defense project using Django REST, Docker, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL, and Kafka.
Implemented backend architecture, including APIs, database design, and event-driven messaging.
Integrated real-time communication via Django Channels and Kafka for asynchronous workflows.

experience.title: Python Backend Developer
description: Developed and maintained web applications using Django REST Framework and MongoDB.
Built API endpoints for integrating backend systems and automated cronjobs for scheduled tasks.
Collaborated using Git, Visual Studio, and Docker for streamlined deployment workflows.

projects.title: Painting Website
projects.description: Developed a Django-based website for artists to upload, manage, and display artwork collections.

projects.title: 2D Mouth Lipsyncing Tool
projects.description: Built an innovative web app that generates 2D mouth lipsync animations from audio scripts.

education.details: Graduated with a CGPA of 3.34, focused on software development and database systems.

blogs.title: Optimizing Django for High Performance
blogs.excerpt: Explore how to improve Django app performance using caching, async tasks, and database tuning.

blogs.title: Building Scalable APIs with Flask and Kafka
blogs.excerpt: A guide to building event-driven microservices using Flask, Kafka, and Docker.

blogs.title: From Backend to Full Stack: My Journey
blogs.excerpt: A personal reflection on evolving from a backend engineer to a full-stack developer with React and Django.
